Package com.empirilytics.qatch.service.lang.builder

Class AbstractProjectBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.empirilytics.qatch.service.lang.builder.AbstractProjectBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProjectBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
CppBuilder, CSharpBuilder, JavaBuilder, JsBuilder, PythonBuilder
public abstract class AbstractProjectBuilder extends Object implements ProjectBuilder
Abstract base class for language specific project builders
